name: Sunrise Visitor Center
description: At 6,400 feet, Sunrise is the highest point in the park accessible by vehicle

name: Naches Peak Loop Trail
description: Distance: 4.5-mile loop </br> Elevation Gain: 700 ft </br> Duration: 3 hrs

name: Paradise
description: At 5,400 feet, Paradise has the busiest visitor center in the park.

name: Narada Falls
description: Distance: 7.6 miles RT </br> Elevation Gain: 1000 ft </br> Duration: 3.5 hrs

name: Grove of the Patriarchs
description: Distance: 1.1 miles RT </br> Elevation Gain: 0 </br> Duration: 1 hr

name: Burroughs Mountain loop
description: Distance: 7 miles RT </br> Elevation Gain: 1,000 ft </br> Duration: 3-4 hrs

name: Summerland
description: Distance: 8 miles RT </br> Elevation Gain: 2,750 ft </br> Duration: 5-7 hrs

name: Crystal Peak
description: Distance: 7 miles RT </br> Elevation Gain: 3,100 ft </br> Duration: 6 hrs

name: Shriner Peak
description: Distance: 8.4 miles RT </br> Elevation Gain: 3,434 ft </br>  Duration: 5-7 hrs

name: Skyline Trail
description: Distance: 5.5-mile loop </br> Elevation Gain: 1,700 ft </br> Duration: 4 hrs

name: Spray Park
description: Distance: 8 miles RT </br> Elevation Gain: 2,200 ft </br> Duration: 3 hrs

name: Wonderland Trail
description: Distance: 93 miles </br> Elevation Gain: 3,500 ft avg daily gain/loss </br> Duration: 10-14 days

name: Chinook Pass
description: Look out for some fantastic views before cresting at Chinook Pass.

name: Stevens Canyon Road
description: Along this road, see a hulking view of Rainier west of Box Canyon.
